articles.description: A California group aiming to promote conservative leaders and causes ahead of Tuesday’s election plan to gather in Sacramento Sunday, potentially setting the scene for a clash with counter-protestors.
articles.content: Californians aiming to promote conservative leaders and causes ahead of Tuesday’s election plan to gather in Sacramento on Sunday, potentially setting the stage for a clash with counter-protesters. Organizers of the “Turn California Red” rally say supporters … [+2200 chars]

articles.description: Utah mayor, a father of 7, ID’d as US service member killed in ‘insider attack’ in Afghanistan foxnews.com
articles.content: A mayor from Utah who has served in the state’s National Guard since 2013 was identified Saturday as the U.S. service member who was killed in an “insider attack” in Afghanistan earlier in the day, according to reports. Brent Taylor, a married father of seven… [+3152 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: 3 Girl Scouts, 1 adult killed in Wisconsin hit-and-run crash
articles.description: Authorities say three Girl Scouts and one woman picking up trash on the side of a western Wisconsin road have been killed in a hit-and-run crash.
articles.content: A pickup truck lurched off a road in western Wisconsin Saturday and hit a group of Girl Scouts picking up trash in the ditch, leaving three girls and one adult dead and critically injuring a fourth girl, police said. Sgt. Daniel Sokup of the Lake Hallie Polic… [+1098 chars]

articles.title: 3 Girl Scouts, woman killed in Wisconsin hit-and-run crash
articles.description: A horrific hit-and-run crash in Wisconsin killed three Girl Scouts and a woman, and left another girl in critical condition, police said.
